CustomField.description: The theme and icon displayed in the toast. Valid values are: success - A green box with a checkmark icon. warning - A yellow box with a warning icon. error - A red box with an error icon. info - A gray box with an info icon.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: The theme and icon displayed in the toast. Valid values are: success - A green box with a checkmark icon. warning - A yellow box with a warning icon. error - A red box with an error icon. info - A gray box with an info icon.
CustomField.label: Type
